metadata.title: CVE-2018-18456 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: The function Object::isName() in Object.h (called fromGfx::opSetFillColorN) in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack-based buffer over-read) via a crafted pdf file, asdemonstrated by pdftoppm.

criterions.comment: xpdf package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
ipe package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
